title: Foundation Basics
description: Foundation is the base of any structure. It transfers load to the soil and keeps the structure stable. There are various types like shallow, deep, isolated, and raft foundations.

title: Beam & Column
description: Beams distribute the load horizontally and columns vertically. Reinforcement plays a crucial role in resisting tension and compression.

title: Brickwork Techniques
description: Proper bonding, curing, and material mix ensure strong brick masonry. Tools like plumb bob and line dori help maintain alignment.

title: Plastering Work
description: Plastering provides a smooth finish. It also increases wall durability. Common types include cement plaster, gypsum, and lime plaster.

title: Flooring Guide
description: Popular flooring types include vitrified tiles, marble, and granite. Correct slope and curing time are essential for long life.

title: Roof Slab Construction
description: Slab types include one-way, two-way, flat slab, and hollow core. Formwork quality and concrete grade determine performance.

title: Waterproofing
description: Waterproofing is essential in bathrooms, terraces, and basements to avoid leaks. Liquid membrane, bituminous coating are widely used.

title: Painting Tips
description: Surface prep, primer coat, and quality paint ensure finish and longevity. Use of putty before paint helps smoothen surface.

title: Electrical Safety
description: Proper wire gauge, earthing, and circuit breakers are crucial for residential safety. Always plan lighting and switchboard locations early.
